# GitHub Copilot Agent Instructions

This directory contains instruction files for GitHub Copilot agents working on the Zeitung project.

## Files

- **code-changes.instructions.md** - Guidelines for making code changes (minimal changes, preserving comments, file organization)
- **pull-requests.instructions.md** - Pull request conventions (conventional commits, PR format)
- **playwright-setup.instructions.md** - Important setup instructions for Playwright tests in agent mode

## Usage

These files provide context and guidelines for AI agents to maintain consistency and quality when contributing to the project. They complement the main CONTRIBUTING.md file at the project root.

## For Contributors

If you're a human contributor, please refer to the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md) file in the project root.
